duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and support operational procedures on different hardware platforms in the client's computer environment.
Improve operational efficiency by championing standardization and innovation.
Provide and automate day-to-day systems administration duties using scripting abilities.
Stay up to date with new technologies and identify those that can help the company's automation efforts.
Work closely with various groups including system administration, application development, and SRE teams.
Be involved in special projects such as designing, testing, and implementing processes that the operations staff handles.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or equivalent work experience.
